attributes.action: Ban On All Car Park Charges In Britain
attributes.additional_details:
I just think car park charges are a nuisance and we should go back to the day there wasn't any car park charges anywhere.

Some of my family members had to go back home just to get the right change for the pay and display meters.  My dad used to go to the town centre loads of times but now hardly ever since they brought in the parking charges.

Please ban car park charges everywhere in britain as it is a burdon on drivers everyday.
